Draft and Recruitment (Sports)
lead_paragraph: Marvin Austin fell out of the first round of the N.F.L. draft over concerns about his character, but the Giants believe he can make a difference.
snippet: Marvin Austin fell out of the first round of the N.F.L. draft over concerns about his character, but the Giants believe he can make a difference.
